title: Bleeding Shadows
description: "In our hearts and in our dreams, the sun will shine until shadows bleed. The light will shine where it's the darkest so it can grow no more."Ron Shotz has been haunted since he was twelve years old by family tragedy. Living in a small town where anyone’s business is everyone’s business, the tragedy lingers over Ron’s identity into his adulthood. Things never go right for Ron Shotz. But his life is about to change. Currently residing in a red, white, and blue trailer on blocks while relying on booze and cigarettes to quell his pain, Ron hits the road to redemption.The story takes place in small town Pennsylvania.
author: Eazra Shrantz
